website_summaries.verdict: This model of booster can also serve as a portable high chair for younger children.
pros: Packs and comes with a strap to take on the go
The feeding tray can go in the dishwasher
Comes with a 3-point strap harness and straps for your chair
The back and the tray can both be removed as your child grows and no longer needs them
Tray is a compact size that makes it more friendly for a lot of kitchens
cons: It is hard plastic and does not have the foamy cushion of some other available models

customer_reviews.title: Save Space and Money
customer_reviews.text: I decided to skip the high chair and go straight to a booster. The seat straps securely onto a regular chair. Secure the belts and attach tray and done. Tray needs to be attached immediately because baby/toddler is not secure with the belt staps at all. I do not have any trouble attaching tray. Cleans very easily however, the straps are a bit more difficult since they do not detach. Lots of grooves for food to get stuck in but just make sure to clean after each use and it is not an issue. Overall I could not be more happy with this seat. Saves space and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sexy but ClassyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I am quite glad I choose this one
customer_reviews.text: I needed a portable seat for my 6 month old granddaughter. I looked at three products and asked several questions other Amazon customers were kind enough to answer. I am quite glad I choose this one. It is very easy to strap to a chair, easy to assemble, very easy to clean, and very easy to snap the tray on even with a squirming baby. It is a nice molded plastic and very sturdy. I have had it several months now and it is holding up very well. Plus it is easy to fold up and store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for restaurants too!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much that I just ordered a second one to keep at my mom's house, since she babysits my 12 month old while I work. It folds up pretty small and is very quick to get out. I keep one of these in my car for restaurants. It fits (with and without tray) in every booth we've visited so far; it also attaches well to just about any chair. I would highly recommend this product for at home or on-the-go. We love it! Pictured is my child fitting very nicely into an average sized booth with the tray attached.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It fits under our table nicely and attaches to the chair great. I love that it has no fabric so it's easy to wipe clean. Since my kid is still a little on the short side to be sitting at the table, we have still been mainly using the highchair (which I hate since it has fabric on it). In the meantime, she carries it all over the house and always wants to eat her snack in it. She loves this chair so much that I'm afraid I might have to buy a second one when we start using it at the table more.
customer_reviews.author: Lmg

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: You don't need cushioning or anything fancy for your infant/toddler etc to sit and eat on. Unless adults who have long conversations at the dining table, babies have such a short attention span (even with food!!) that they're not in the seat as long as you'd like/hope/wish for!! Best booster/chair for my 4 month old who has good head neck strength already! No need to do any more research because I already did and am so glad I got this one!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Getting daily use - could be better quality
customer_reviews.text: Useful! I use this for my toddler during church, for crafts at home, for meals, travel, and just as a little reading/snack seat. He's a big 18- mo and fits well. Pros: - easy to clean -Lightweight -Folds pretty compactly for travel Cons: -Tray is difficult to snap on - I have to lean over and check that it's actually snapped in -Straps tend to dangle everywhere when traveling -Plastic is a bit flimsy, and overpriced for what it is Overall, I'm glad I got this - it's seen daily use so far. Just wish it wasn't so expensive (would have purchased used locally if I had been able to find one).
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: This booster seat works perfect as a highchair! Take it from a mom of 2.
customer_reviews.text: This child's booster seat is convenient, lightweight and works just as its supposed too. Place it on any regular sized chair and use the straps to snap it on securly. So simple to clean too as its all plastic. Nice colors that aren't too loud. This is a must have b/c every mom needs a highchair and this one is inexpensive and works great plus, as an added bonus, you can unsnap it and take it to a restaurant or a friends house. From a mom of 2, this gets 5 stars from me :)
customer_reviews.author: Independent thinker

customer_reviews.title: Great little seat - wish for a few product updates to make it easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: The seat is great - it straps easily to a chair, it fits well at the table, and my little guy sits safely in it. Only issue I have with it are the fabric straps. I wish these companies would start creating straps that are NOT fabric. If they could create something that is akin to the material used in an Apple watch strap that would be SO MUCH EASIER TO CLEAN. Everything gets stuck in those fabric straps - sauce, crumbs, everything. Being able to wipe them clean would be amazing. Instead, wiping them down just kind of seems to push the food further into the strap, staining it or making it a permanent part of the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new parents and grandparents
customer_reviews.text: Love the Fisher-Price Healthy Care Booster Seats and highly recommend this to all families to save money and space. It’s simple, but it works and lasts a long time. The seat is made of durable plastic, which means it’s easy to clean and rinse off. The bonus points are 1. easy to strap on to any chair securely 2. convenient to bring it anywhere you want 3. doesn’t take much space in the kitchen/dining room compared to the bulky high chairs. If you have the budget, can consider the seat with height adjustable legs.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat! I bought this as a replacement for a seat that my son kept popping the tray off of and standing up in... This easily slides under the table with the tray on. The tray snaps on very securely, but I wouldn't say it's difficult to get off. I can pop off one of the sides with one hand without a problem. More importantly, my son can't pop it off. Not many corners for crumbs to hide in, so it's pretty easy to keep clean. I don't think the straps are technically removable, but just by looking at them, I think you could fold the ends in to remove and wash. Great purchase, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: I have both my kiddos in these high chairs, and they are great. Fairly easy to keep clean (except for the straps though) but they wipe down easy, they strap onto chairs very easily, and they can either have the tray or be pushed up to the table. My only warning - if you have these on a chair that has fabric, put a towel down first because crumbs and food can fall through the strap holes in the chair and you'll want to protect your chair because things will fall in there, its inevitable. These are the best high chairs though and I 100% recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Katie ATop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I tried super expensive $75 booster chairs with my twins and hated ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried super expensive $75 booster chairs with my twins and hated them--too hard to clean and too hard to take on and off the table. I ordered these, and everything about them is awesome. SO GREAT, esp for the price. I love that: - they are 100% easy to clean between meals - straps are super easy to take on and off for washing (we had a diarrhea mess, and no worries--straps came right out and I could sanitize the rest of the chair) - easy to put on and take off the chairs - trays easily fit in the dish washer
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good little seats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use in our church fellowship hall. Handy to use and store! I personally own a Summer Infant seat like this, and the Fisher Price version is much sturdier. However, the Summer Infant actually folds down flat so it's half the thickness (or less) of these seats. If you're looking for something compact for traveling, I'd go with the Summer Infant. If you're not short on space and you want a seat for daily use that will withstand a lot of abuse, go with the Fisher Price. I love the ease of popping the tray on and off.
customer_reviews.author: JYo

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Secure
customer_reviews.text: Since my granddaughter who is 14 mos. old, was starting to stand up in her traditional high chair, I knew I had to find a safer alternative. I first ordered one for her mom and she absolutely loved it. Easy in, easy out, easy to clean and much safer. My granddaughter loves it too. The straps keep the chair secure on a kitchen chair and also keep her secure in the chair itself. So versatile and reasonably priced. I have one at my place now too. No complaints and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Souders

customer_reviews.title: Nice booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter started refusing to sit in a high chair so we bought this so she could sit at the table. She likes that she’s part of the table now and enjoys buckling herself in the seat. It is pretty easy to clean but small particles of food might get trapped in the narrow slots where the straps come through the plastic. If you have cushioned chairs like we do, you might want to protect it with a puppy pad or similar waterproof sheet, because food will fall onto the chair where the child’s feet are.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Easy
customer_reviews.text: We decided not to get a full high chair and this has worked out tremendously well. We have been using for over a month and it's been great for our 8 month old. The straps are very adjustable and she is pretty secure before I even snap the tray in place. Love that this can be continued to use as she grows. I will say I do wish the tray was bigger or longer because I would have liked to be able to fit those silicone bowl and plate placements on but they are bigger than the tray area.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: New model
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace our old clip on high chair (same brand and style). I was delightfully surprised by the updated features. The clips come together in the center, it seems to be more secure of a hold’s than the previous of of to side clips. The straps do come out for washing/rinsing which is nice so they don’t get grubby looking in comparison to the rest of the freshly clean seat and tray. I appreciate the little things for my little one :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Versatile little high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is an awsum high chair. It’s cute, compact, cleans super easily. My 1 year old generally doesn’t like sitting in her high chair but this one she is all for it. ofcourse I put it on the floor so may b she doesn’t feel like it’s a high chair. I bought it to take on a trip for her but I think we will end up using it for more than the trip. I already give her paper and crayons to scribble when she sits in this chair and she loves it. The concept is great. A high chair away from home at an affordable price and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: must have for your baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson when he was 4 months old and starting to eat baby food. It securly straps to a chair that has a back. It is portable and can be taken anywhere, we have even taken it to restaurants. The tray can be put in the dishwasher, but I always just used warm soapy water, Every part of this seat is easy to keep clean and it is way more convenient than a regular high chair.
customer_reviews.author: My2boys8386

customer_reviews.title: Great for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for when our grandchildren come to visit! It doesn't take up much space, they are safe and secure and, after several uses, it is easier to remove the tray - I'm glad because if an emergency arose, I could get the baby out quickly. It fits nice and secure to our dinning room chairs as well so I don't worry about the kiddos sitting in it. A great purchase, I just wish I would have bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: No room for highchair
customer_reviews.text: This seat is AWESOME! Easy to strap onto a chair and strap the kid in so that they can make a huge mess. Wipes up easily with a cloth and when done I can toss it anywhere else to get it out of the way. My kitchen is small so I have no room for a big highchair. This seat means my kids don't have to bring one with them when they come to visit. My 8mo grandbaby had a great time in this chair. If they can make adult sizes that would be great!
customer_reviews.author: CMac

customer_reviews.title: but it sure would have been nice to have had one in new condition
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a returned seat. It had marks and scratches on it. It was a bit cheaper here than elsewhere so I'll go ahead and keep it, but it sure would have been nice to have had one in new condition. I do love how it folds for storage. This is for my grandson when he comes over and we travel, so I won't be able to put it to use right away, thus can't speak to it's performance as of yet. Stay tuned . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep at my parents’ house so I wouldn’t have to carry around our large convertible high chair. I’m actually starting to like this one better than our very expensive one! It’s easy to attach to any chair, takes up very little room, and incredibly easy to clean! The tray also doesn’t hit my son in the groin like our bigger one sometimes does when we attach it. The removable tray can easily fit inside a dishwasher, but also small enough to easily wash in the sink. This is a perfect chair if you’re looking for something that doesn’t take up a lot of space and as easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: K.J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Getting rid of our high chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! My husband bought it for me because I was bummed out on missing a sale on a bumbo seat. This one is so convenient especially when you have a small dining area. It’s easy to move around and take with us when we go on trips. We actually are going to get rid of our high chair because this is so much easier and takes up less space. It’s perfect for our son and we’ve used it since he was 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  great price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair. Colors are bright and product was clean and new when I opened it. Reason it is not given 5 stars: I would like to point out that the 2 side straps are NOT the same length. One is significantly shorter than the other. It wasn't cut to be the same length as the other & that causes it to be slightly tighter on one side. I have to adjust the short strap to its longest length, while the other strap I have to tighten every time because it has excess length.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter hated to sit in the chair
customer_reviews.text: My 10 week old granddaughter did not like this chair. Wouldn't sit in it without fussing. She loves her bumbo chair, but this chair seemed to be very uncomfortable for her, so gave it away
customer_reviews.author: PPA

customer_reviews.title: Great little booster / high-chair - we love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. It's so much easier to clean than our regular high-chair. Just strap on to a standard chair and you're good to go! Only thing I'd not is that is does NOT have shoulder straps (since it is a convertible unit), so for smaller babies, you need to make sure you're watching them if the tray isn't on as they could fall out... but you should be watching your kiddo in this anyway, so just a good reminder!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair for my 9 month old. It is super easy to clean and use. It straps behind the chair and under it to ensure he can’t wiggle the chair out of place. The tray is easy to remove to wash and the seat is easy to wipe down!
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Mata

customer_reviews.title: Your baby can eat with you anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item because my little Greatdaughter could sit comfortably and eat with the family. I liked it because it was just like a highchair, except you place it on a chair, all the food goes on the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet L. Zwaskis

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My young toddler loves this booster seat. It fits perfectly on the dining room chair, and the chair still slides under the table with it on. He's at a good height with or without the tray to eat at the table with the family. The straps are easy to attach to the chair, and the rubber on the bottom makes it not slip. As a mom, I'm very particular about what products are safe for my kids, and I would buy this again, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Luella Krautkramer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for eating on-the-go!
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat has been a lifesaver! When we get together with family there are usually multiple young children and only one high chair. This booster seat has been very handy to provide an extra seat at the table for our one year old (we purchased it when he was 9 months old). It folds up easily and is compact so we can leave it in the trunk of my SUV so it's always there when we need it. It also securely straps onto regular dining room chairs with ease. I recommend this seat for anyone who needs a high chair on-the-go.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Better than SpaceSaver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel or everyday use. So easy to clean. We had a fisher price spacesaver before this and food would get down in every crack. the spacesaver required a screwdriver to take the whole thing apart and clean it properly. This one has less places for crumbs and food to hide. The tray is much smaller but also makes it easier to clean. I am considering buying another one to keep one at home and one in the vehicle for travel. The back is very straight up so it works best for a babe who is able to sit up for an extended period of time on their own. My little it 17 months and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tickytackTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect booster seat. It took about 1 minute to install. It has really easy straps. My son loves it. It is all plastic which is fabulous for wiping up spills and for potty training (no mess-just wipe). I haven't used the tray--i just use it at the table. Perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great little chair at a nice little price tag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who came to visit. Worked great for meals and arts and crafts. He’s a pretty healthy 18mth old and fit fine with room to grow. This is light weight and we placed it on a sturdy wooden chair. I didn’t fell worried about it tipping over. This would be great for travel. It doesn’t fold up but the tray is removable and optional if you prefer to have your little one use the table.
customer_reviews.author: M.Day

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC product for those on the go
customer_reviews.text: This product was so perfect for our family trip to South Africa. Because we were staying with family whom had no children I wanted something that I could put on one of their chairs and would essentially be out of the way. My 14 month old fit it in it great and it is VERY easy to clean. Was also great to take to places that didn't have highchairs as it fits on to any chair an adult would sit in. Although we were able to ship it I would say you could fit it in a suitcase but it would take up quite a bit of room.
customer_reviews.author: M&R's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Love! Way better than one that attaches to table itself
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after having a high chair that attached to the table because I was trying to save space. This is so much better. I just attached it to the seat I have and this is so easy to clean. The tray just snaps on and has three different options so as baby grows you can move it further from them. Also love that you can just throw the tray in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Catie M

customer_reviews.title: A great product - beautiful and cleans easily!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little chair/ booster seat! I bought it for my granddaughter who occasionally visits. She is just a little over a year old now and we love using this chair during her feeding time. It is solid, attaches firmly to our kitchen chairs, cleans so easily as it has no gaps and edges to have to dig into! I love how easy it is to remove the tray and just rinse it with water or quickly wash it with dishwashing soap. It’s small enough to get into the kitchen sink and be washed without splashing too much. Such a good find! Thank you, Fisher-Price for such a good and beautiful product that will “grow” with my granddaughter! - Maria
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ovcharov

customer_reviews.title: Great little seat for little ones
customer_reviews.text: This seat is awesome for the price. The tray comes off so easily and you can just pop it into the dishwasher or hand wash quickly in the sink. I bought this in lieu of a big bulky high chair that takes up a ton of space in our galley kitchen. I also like this one bc its all plastic, no need to constantly remove a fabric liner to wash it. I placed it on a folding chair and so far so good! Very easy to clip on and seems very secure.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude™

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Been using since 8 months old-- kid is now 3. I got it to replace the ridiculously overpriced Sven chair that we returned. While pregnant (and oh so naive!) I was all about beautiful, wooden, elegant everything. After having a kid, I appreciate affordable, plastic, easy-to-clean, take-up-as-little-space as possible everything. Save money on this and spend it on diapers, for goodness sake! Around age 2 we stopped using the tray and pushed this up to the table. Adjustable height means we'll probably use this til age 4, maybe even 5? (Although kid prefers to sit at little table for most meals now anyway...)
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: Too short for table
customer_reviews.text: I like the seat overall. Cleaning it isn’t that easy cause it’s strapped to the chair so if you get something under the seat, it’s a bit annoying. My main issue with the seat is that it’s shorter than the Graco booster we have for our son. And it also seems a bit narrow. It may work with younger kids but as they get a bit older, this seat may not work.
customer_reviews.author: WANDSB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son when he was 18 months because we his highchair just took up too much space in the kitchen. So far, we have really liked this product and are so glad that we are using this versus a high chair. It’s been great so far. The only comment I have is that when we received it, there were some parts of the plastic that were significantly lighter on the seat than the other parts of the plastic. Other than that it has been a good product .
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean, great booster!
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is fantastic. I was really worried purchasing one seeing that we have high dining chairs, but this booster does its job! I also should add that my two year old is a wild child, bangs on it, and it withstands all of the toddler mishaps. It is soo easy to clean. The tray comes off really easy and I can wash it right in the sink. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LoveHealth_Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Great High Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest high chair. So pleased I ordered it, better than I expected. I ordered for my twin grandchildren 12 mos old. Perfect for them to eat at the table. This seat keeps them securely seated and fantastic for finger food or us feeding with the spoon. I love it, folds away for when they go home. Ordered to for their father's house.
customer_reviews.author: Ds

customer_reviews.title: Good product/ terrible shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I was wanting however it arrived with a damaged box no outside box and there were scratch marks on chair due to the damage to box. If there had been an outer box to protect product this probably wound not have happened. I need the chair now cant wait to return and get replacement or I would have. Usually Amazon items are shipped in better ways.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. We've used it daily with our daughter for the past 3 months, since we got it. It's relatively easy to wipe down when she splatters food all over, it's super portable and doesn't take up much space which is wonderful for our little cabin, so we don't need to have a big high chair taking up room. She gets excited now whenever she seems it because she knows its food time. It can strap to chairs, but it can so just sit on the floor if you want to do that instead. It's pretty sturdy and has held up so far, I don't foresee any issues with the manufacturing. This was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use/clean/travel with booster seat!
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler has been feuding with his highchair lately, so we bought this seat, so he can sit at the dining room table with us. It's easily secured to the dining room chair, which is padded, and we put a towel underneath and behind it because toddler hands are messy. Easy to fold up and take with you, and since it's all plastic, very easy to clean, which is a must in our house.
customer_reviews.author: ARuss

customer_reviews.title: Get the deluxe instead
customer_reviews.text: This is a good chair and easy to travel with. However, I would recommend you spent a couple bucks more to get the deluxe version. It comes with a removable tray and cover which protects the actual tray during travel. Spend the extra few bucks and get the deluxe
customer_reviews.author: Fu

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 month old after we had been using a wooden high chair that did not have a tray. We wanted her to start being able to feed herself and not having a tray was not working out. This works perfectly. It’s so easy to clean and wipe down. The tray fits in my dishwasher. We haven’t traveled with it yet but will be in a few weeks. I think it will work great. We’re very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little seat!
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time! I keep this in my car and we bring it into all restaurants, it is perfect size and gives my daughter her own space to eat, which means less mess! I love this so much, I want to use it as her main high chair at home too but we paid $150 for her regular high chair.... This seat is perfect size for her to reach everything with baby led weaning. We also love that we can throw the tray in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this booster seat for its simplicity. I bought it to have at my home for my grandson. It is great, and very easy to use and clean. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Love This Seat!
customer_reviews.text: We have very narrow dining room chairs that most booster seats are too big for. This one fits perfectly! It's also very easy to clean and the tray clicks on and off with no issues. The only complaint I have is that the straps get dirty since they're fabric. I haven't seen a high chair that doesn't have this issue though, so it's not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Excellent booster seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great booster seat. Our toddler decided at 1 1/2 that he wanted out of the highchair. We had to find something that would work for him. This was the answer. We do not use the tray, just sit him at the table with us. It is a great height for just that. He loves to sit in it to color, eat, and just be with the grown ups. It does have belts on it to hold them in. Also, it locks on to the chair to keep it sturdy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy,  well made, just don't think its for kids older then 2yrs old.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, straps seem to be good quality material. The tray is very easy to remove. My grandson is a year old, fits in it perfect. He weighs about 28lbs. I have to put the tray out on the 1st setting. I i planned on using this for a booster seat for several yrs, but I can see I'll need to buy a larger one. I think its made small.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Conley🌼

customer_reviews.title: My chubby toddler didn't seem comfortable with the tray attached
customer_reviews.text: My mom ordered this for us to use at her house during the holidays. It worked for that purpose, but there is a piece of plastic that comes down from the center of the tray between the legs and one that comes up from the bottom too. My chubby toddler didn't seem comfortable with the tray attached. The one we have at home doesn't have that piece hanging down from the tray and his thighs have more room.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared at 1st to buy this product form other customer reviews saying "they don't make things like they used too". While this is generally true - we have had no issues with this travel chair! We have already gotten so much use our of it and hope to for many years to come. We keep it in our car and use it when traveling to friends and family houses that won't have a high chair for us. It's so light weight, easy to clean, fits on all different types of chairs. You can't beat the price or the functionality of this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4life

customer_reviews.title: Upset that i received it damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I received the product damaged, looks like it was probably used by another costumer and returned. I did not buy the product open box so i expected it to be new and with no damages at all. I attached some pictures in person it looks much worse. Other than that i like it since it’s really light weight oh and if you plan on using this with a toddler i don’t think it will work out since it’s quiet small unless you have a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great little chair! We got this so that my daughter could eat outside with us when we BBQ without having to drag her high chair out. It's really sturdy, easy to strap on tightly and works as a booster or high chair for a child that is already sitting on his/her own. My husband took it to a friend's house when I was out of town & he was really happy with how easy it was to carry too. Great product! FYI my daughter is 23 months and 25 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen R. Orzoff

customer_reviews.title: I love how safely Grandbaby sits in it
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, love how safely Grandbaby sits in it on standard chairs, love how the tray goes into the dishwasher and how everything wipes clean. With my arthritis, it's a little difficult to snap the tray on and off. Luckily, I had other around to help. The booster can be used without the the tray too, in a pinch. The back folds down, making it a little more compact for storage. I have been happy to recommend this pretty seat to other people.
customer_reviews.author: shoppersusy

customer_reviews.title: Best booster seat ever.
customer_reviews.text: I just love this booster seat/ space saver chair. I had found it at Aldi for 18.00 and was so surprised at how great it was at such a low price. My second daughter was born and turned of age to need a booster seat like her big sister, I was happy to see Amazon sells it too! It’s easy and comes in handy if you want to take it while you’re traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bohls

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old kept wiggling out of her prior high chair so we thought we would try this to get something more secure and safe. Not only do we love this but she does too. She walks over and wants to sit in it even when we’re nit eating. She is safely secured in it and There is no way she can escape. Such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bought it for 13 month old
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought it for 13 month old. I was tired of spending hours on cleaning high chair and went with this. And I cant believe why i was waiting for so long (second child). The expensive high chair went straight to the trash. Baby sits in this booster much more comfortably, with the straight back, it can be pushed to dinging table or he can use the little tray. Cleaning takes 2 seconds. Baby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: K23rs

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a fancier high chair. This is all you need.
customer_reviews.text: BEST high chair for your money. We registered for an expensive brand, stand-alone high chair originally. But it was just awful to clean and the tilt of the chair had our little one leaning back too far. This is perfect for a baby who is sitting up well and ready to start solids. I like the way good posture is supported in this chair. It is very easy to clean-- important when you have to scrub it off 2-3 times a day. The tray just clicks on and off and there aren't many hard to clean cloth bits. It attaches to any chair so you can travel with it if needed. No need to spend more on a fancier product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to sit, so I decided to get him one since it's very affordable, space saver, and easy to clean. I am a germaphobe, so this product is amazing. It's very easy to take apart, so I can bring it outside with me & when I get home, I just hose the entire thing down. My son loves to play with his food, and I let him, so he learns different textures, I'm glad that I don't have to worry about washing his cover all the time :).
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been doing battle with our three year old when it comes to dinner lately. She doesn’t want to sit in a high chair because she’s a “big girl.” She can’t sit on a regular chair, because she’s too small. She doesn’t want the booster seat from her high chair because she “not a baby.” She can’t sit on a bunch of cushions because she’s too wiggly. This was the perfect compromise and exactly what our big girl needed.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Compact and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Purchased 3 of these for my in home daycare and they get used several times a day. They wash up easy and fold up nicely to fit perfect on my shelf. I haven't tried putting the trays in the dishwasher but we use them so often it's easier to just wipe them down real quick. There are no weird crevices for food to fall into. I use these sitting in the floor. I haven't tried them attached to chairs but the straps are sturdy so I'm sure it would work real good for that.
customer_reviews.author: sweettart

customer_reviews.title: Little Ones love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: My little great-grandchildren come over often, and this seat provides a great option for them to sit in at snack-time when they're not quite big enough to sit at the adult's table yet. Easy to buckle/un-buckle the safety belt and secure the tray. Easy to wipe clean. Fastens securely to your kitchen chair.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Use experience
customer_reviews.text: I was planed to return it but after I used once I loved it so much. It saves my time when I dinner outside home. Actually I bring this booster everywhere with me now. It really useful to keep my baby quiet. And I can enjoy my dinner too. Only thing I need to mention is this booster not big size enough for all baby. My baby is 10 months now and it is right size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Janesa

customer_reviews.title: Better than a highchair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ~$20 i ever spent on a baby item. Highchair we had was getting gross because it was impossible to clean, so we got this. Wish I had started with this even if he couldn't sit up perfectly. SO EASY TO CLEAN. Kiddo's 15 months now and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I was tired of messing with the giant high chair we inherited and used for our first child. It works great and our baby seems to like it more because it is more open than the high chair was. I was a bit worried that more food would end up on the ground, but it is still just exactly as much food as doesn't end up in my baby's mouth. Freed up a bunch of space for my wife and I when we were both going stir crazy from all the baby stuff everywhere. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love it-- works great for our daughter easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love it-- works great for our daughter easy to clean, just wish the straps were detachable for cleaning purposes but I am pretty anal about keeping it clean anyway so I take the time to wipe everything down after she eats so it still looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Happy for the most part
customer_reviews.text: The seat works pretty well. However, my 7 1/2 month grandson already seems on the verge of being able to squirm out of it, so we will see. Only other problem is the under-chair strap has to be fastened under the middle of the chair seat, so it is hard to reach the clasp without turning the chair upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Kitsie Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Decent little high chair. Attaches easily to our kitchen chairs. Giving a three star review as we realized the seat was not comfortable for our little one. He would have a little red mark on his back from where his back was pressing against the plastic seat. They should really have some removable padding to cushion their backs and bottoms. We ended up ordering a Graco Slim Snacker and love it. It has more room for him, is padded and reclines. It also folds up easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Exelent  producto
customer_reviews.text: Gracias no todos los repartidores lo dejan en la casa correcta pero este repartidor si exelente producto satisfecha y Feliz Thank you not all the delivery people leave it in the right house but this delivery man is an excellent product satisfied and Happy
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Lazo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great if you don't want a bulky highchair hanging out in your kitchen, taking up lots of space. This seat is very incognito. Fits in a dining chair and can be pushed under the table when not in use. Love that it is completely washable. No porous surfaces for food/germs to seep into. It's convertible too. Will be the only chair we will ever need. It's definitely not fancy. No frills. But little one makes such a mess that I prefer function over form! (I do recommend a chair cover with this seat though!)
customer_reviews.author: L.Fogs

customer_reviews.title: but I still wanted something fabric free that was easily washable. This chair is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have had an ikea high chair for years with my other two. But it was driving me crazy because it didn’t fit snuggly to the child and so lots of food got dropped through and made a mess on he floor and child. I had enough, but I still wanted something fabric free that was easily washable. This chair is perfect. Easy to wipe down, but the tray fits close to my baby. So way less mess!!
customer_reviews.author: Nessapier

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this chair
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chair, when he is hungry he will pull it down and sit in it on the floor and snap his tray in place and wait for food. It is easy to secure to a chair but can also be used on the ground. Keep in mind on the ground they can kick against the ground and scooch back so need to be supervised.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We are grandparents of two little ones and wanted something for when they visit and when we rent a place to visit them. This was fantastic! His mama even said she liked it better than his high chair at home because he sits up so much better in it because it has a spot for the little butts and legs so they don't slip and it is wonderful to clean. Will be easy to transport on our road trips to visit him.
customer_reviews.author: Cashmere Mountain Bed and Breakfast

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this booster seat for my grandson when he comes to visit. I already bought two high chairs that I got rid of because they were such a nuisance and took up so much space. My grandson loves sitting on a chair by the table with all the “ big boys”
customer_reviews.author: Caroline 711

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Chair
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic high hair. Very portable and easy to install. Great price. We have another highchair as well with the fabric cover. It is a pain with all the mess that kiddos bring when eating. I like that this one is just wipe off and done. My son likes sitting in it on the floor because it is like the small chairs they have a daycare and he can sit by himself. Would recommend, just not for younger babies that can not sit well on their own.
customer_reviews.author: roobrr

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Needed something that took up less room and included our two-year-old at the table better than his high chair. This is great. We haven't taken it anywhere, but that would be easy to do. It's easy to clean and doesn't have a bunch of nooks and crannies. It attaches securely to our chairs.
customer_reviews.author: austenfan442

customer_reviews.title: Baby started out sitting on the table where we could control the mess a bit better, and now she sits on a chair at ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed. Baby started out sitting on the table where we could control the mess a bit better, and now she sits on a chair at the table to eat with us. Easy to clean (just throw in the shower and the food comes off fast, even if it's caked on). I saw that some people in the reviews had issues with the straps not being secure enough, but I did not experience this problem with my daughter....when she's strapped in, she's nice and secure, even when shes being squirmy!
customer_reviews.author: Sizzle Moon

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair for my great grandson when he was a year old. He sat and ate in the chair from day one. He is now 22 months old and loved hooking and unhooking the straps himself. Chair is very able. Also use to sit him in front of the computer to play his favorite videos. Cleans up beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Carole A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: We got this out of the box only minutes before we needed it and there was absolutely no issues with securing it to a chair and the baby really loved not being in a highchair or a lap. Very easy to clean because most of it is molded plastic. I have to order two more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice little chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson who is a tiny little guy, barely 14lbs at 8 MOs. The straps to hold him in are still too big, but other than that this is a perfect little travel chair. Nice wide base so he can’t flip it over. Cleans up with warm water and dish soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amy O

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Love these seats. I have 3 now so we always have them for the kids. I can attach to a chair at the dining table, sit on the floor, or bring into a restaurant easily. The whole thing is super easy to clean and the tray is great to load in the kitchen and then just click in place.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for our little place.
customer_reviews.text: We live in a small apartment that’s also fully carpeted (yes even the dining room smh), so investing in a highchair didn’t make sense. This booster seat is perfect because we can place it on top of our table during feeds, which decreases the chances of our carpet getting stains, and after feeding we can place it right on top of a chair or under the table. Also, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Enaiya1

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! We have 2 booster seats that we use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! We have 2 booster seats that we use and really didn't even need a highchair for our daughter. I do wish the colors were more girly but it is well made, easy to use, small/compact, and very portable. Highly recommend to people to just get a product like this and skip buying an expensive highchair.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap? Or amazing?
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little hesitant because I thought it was not enough money for a chair. But when we got it it worked out great! We love using it and our boy seems to enjoy eating and getting fat and sassy in his chair :-)
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size & Weight
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for a family member that came to visit with her little one. Plus, it's light weight & we could easily transport it. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Janan

customer_reviews.title: I used something similar when my own kids were little and it's the best thing ever just as it was 20+ years ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson since I really don't have room for a high chair (and who needs one with this?). I used something similar when my own kids were little and it's the best thing ever just as it was 20+ years ago. It attaches to the dining chair so that he sits at the same height as everyone else when we're eating. It folds easily and the straps work well for carrying it to restaurants or the great-grands. I started using this as soon as he was able to halfway sit and will continue until he outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauras1316

customer_reviews.title: Great product , great price
customer_reviews.text: very easy to assemble, to straps that buckle for back of chair and bottom , when child is seated there a secure belt that attaches from each side ! fits my almost two year old daughter with room to grow ! A breeze to clean the table and the actual chair ! I would highly recommend to any parent who doesnt want the bulky highchair just something simple that works 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Byrdeyeview

customer_reviews.title: I love how lightweight and cleanable it is
customer_reviews.text: Frustration Saver is what I call this! My 14 month loves it. We leave it in the living room by her toys and she gets in it and sits. I love how lightweight and cleanable it is. We even brought it on a picnic and found it useful on the ground-except for her trying to kick the ground and go backwards but none the less, it made the picnic scene easier to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: brigitte

customer_reviews.title: I like that this one could fold up and be carried ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my daughter who was 7 months at the time because we didn't have room for a big high chair. I like that this one could fold up and be carried by the straps but it was a little too small for my daughter. When I would sit her in it the tray would dig into my daughters stomach. She also didn't care for it. When we had it on the floor she would push her feet and almost tip back. I wasn't able to use it on a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Leah L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect seat for Grandma's kitchen and house
customer_reviews.text: We were considering buying a high chair but really only needed a seat for our granddaughter to sit in while at the table. I saw this one and the reviews appeared to be good. Love it! It packs up easily and can be transported.
customer_reviews.author: FCPmom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It’s perfect for what I need. My 19 month old was in need of a change in seat, and we use this at my mom’s house. It comes put together minus the tray that comes with it. Extremely easy to put onto a chair. Just make sure you look at the sizing details. I didn’t have an issue with this, but it is a little wider than I thought it would be. This works for my daughter, and we’ll use this until she grows out of it!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and secure for active toddlers...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our active 2 year old nephew to use at our house when visiting each week. Very sturdy and the child is super secure; he was strapped in to the booster seat and it strapped to the chair quite securely. The tray is a good addition but can easily be removed to scoot the child right up to the table. We are overly pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chanda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat so my baby can have somewhere to eat when she's over at her grandma's without me having to fork out another couple of hundred dollars for a huge chair like she has at home. It's pretty good for the price. My only complaint would be that I wish it had some sort of cushion for the back and seat area so she's not sitting on hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to strap to chair, takes up much less space than a high chair
customer_reviews.text: I had three grandchildren visiting for Christmas, ages from 18 months to 3 years old. All the moms snagged this booster chair first. I bought another brand one for smaller kids and it was much less useful, even for 18 mo. old. The high chair took up way too much space at the table. I didn't even use tray that came with this seat--just boosted the kid up to the table with the adults. Well worth the cost and easy to move from one chair to another. I would recommend, even over purchasing a standard high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Donna in Santa Fe

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I received this booster seat within 2 days. My grandson is 8 months old and he loves it. It is so easy to move around and clean. you can just put it in your car when you travel and it doesn't take up much room. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Nastally

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect alternative in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son. I didn't want to have to re-buy a big bulky highchair for my third child. This is the perfect alternative in my opinion. Especially since it's small enough that you can take it on the go with you. For example, when we go to visit relatives, we can take this, versus loading a big high chair and lugging it around. It's also a nice spot for my son to sit strapped in without the tray just to watch me when he doesn't want to be alone while I'm cooking. Definitely a good purchase, it would make a great baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Healthy Care Booster Seat
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingHealthy Care Deluxe Booster Seat has a feeding tray you can sanitize right in the dishwasher, with smooth, easy-to-wipe surfaces so it’s easy to keep clean! Three height adjustments allow for a custom fit to any table; front & rear seat straps adjust to fit almost any chair! Folds compactly for portability, with a carry strap so you can take it anywhere. Tray and seat back remove for easy conversion to a portable toddler booster seat!
feature_bullets: Straps easily & securely to most dining & kitchen chairs
Easy-clean seat—no crevices to trap crumbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars4,708 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
